head.title: Riitta A. Juvonen, Ned A. Schoenfeld

hedline.hl1: Riitta A. Juvonen, Ned A. Schoenfeld

block.p: Riitta Anneli Juvonen, the daughter of Tapio and Annikki Juvonen of Helsinki, Finland, is to be married today to Ned Arthur Schoenfeld, a son of Herbert and Gloria Schoenfeld of Massapequa Park, L.I. Rabbi Barnett Brickner is to officiate at the Pratt Mansions in New York.
The bride, 28, graduated from the Sibeliuslukio School in Helsinki. She designs children's clothing in London.

Riitta Anneli Juvonen, the daughter of Tapio and Annikki Juvonen of Helsinki, Finland, is to be married today to Ned Arthur Schoenfeld, a son of Herbert and Gloria Schoenfeld of Massapequa Park, L.I. Rabbi Barnett Brickner is to officiate at the Pratt Mansions in New York.
The bride, 28, graduated from the Sibeliuslukio School in Helsinki. She designs children's clothing in London.
The bridegroom, 33, graduated from the University of Pennsylvania. He is the director of European product operations in the London office of CS First Boston, the investment bank. WEDDINGS
